game.description: Investigate the mysterious occurrence of ghostly apparitions in the abandoned mine.
game.objective: Discover the cause behind the paranormal activity and put an end to it.
game.quest_giver: Grumpy Old Miner, found at the local tavern.
game.reward: A chest containing 100 gold pieces and a rare gemstone.

tasks.description: Explore the abandoned mine, searching for clues.
tasks.location: The old mine on the outskirts of town.
tasks.objective: Find any evidence of what might be causing the paranormal activity.

tasks.description: Talk to the local residents and gather more information about the mine's history.
tasks.location: The local tavern or nearby homes.
tasks.objective: Hear any rumors or stories that might shed some light on the cause.

game.title: The Haunting of Deadwood Mine
